overview: Animation with coloured salt by Aleksandra Korejwo. Graphic design based on El Greco's paintings. Music by Franz Schubert performed by Kaja Danczowska on violin and Janusz Olejniczak on piano.

production_companies.name: Telewizyjne Studio Filmow Animowanych w Poznan

title: Ave Maria (Ellens Gesang III) D. 839
